Package EClass.Presentation

Package Presentation defines objects and operations related to the presentation's content.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Layer
    A Layer object is essentially a stack-able, editable image on top of a Slide.
    LayerPermissions
    The LayerPermissions object is an aggregate of the Layer class.
    Presentation
    A Presentation is a collection of slides and their respective layers which is displayed at the center of the EClass.
    PresentationHTML
    A PresentationHTML contains all of the markup info and methods needed to create or open a presentation.
    Slide
    A Slide object that can be edited by a presenter or participant.

Package EClass.Presentation Description

Package Presentation defines objects and operations related to the presentation's content.

There are objects for both the presentation slides and the underlying markup (PresentationHTML). Additionally, this package includes much of the layer functionality. This can be seen in the Layer and LayerPermission objects.
